root: ^The boys were watching over the girls in the school locker room. They all ran away, except for one. What should we do to him?
^Beat him on the face with a shoe
^Strip for him a little, just for teasing

res1: ^He's got a broken nose, and I was taken to the police. I really shouldn't have lost my temper
^The boys were watching over the girls in the school locker room. They all ran away, except for one. I beat him on the face with a shoe, broke his nose and had big troubles afterwards.
res2: ^They said I did the right thing, and that guy got some trouble. Well, I think he deserves it
^The boys were watching over the girls in the school locker room. They all ran away, except for one. I told the teacher on him, and he had big problems. I hope it serves him right.
res3: ^He keeps staring at me, I think he likes me
^The boys were watching over the girls in the school locker room. They all ran away, except for one. I let him go, and now he keeps staring at me. I think he likes me.
res4: ^The dude got so excited he almost lost his mind
^The boys were watching over the girls in the school locker room. They all ran away, except for one. I stripped for him a little, and he got so excited he nearly lost his mind.
